rationale:
**Why this is right**
Placeholder rationale for OTR Practice Test 4 - Q047. Selected option A pending LLM review.

**Why the others miss**
This section will explain distractors after the generator step is wired.

> Options
- A. D ynamic extension orthosis to allow active elbow flexion and extension through a full arc of motion
- B. Long-arm thermoplastic immobilization orthosis to position the affected elbow in complete extension
- C. Elbow mobilization flexion restriction orthosis to allow controlled passive ROM from 0° extension to 90° flexion
- D. SOOCGOOOOOCOCOCOGODOOC000000000 Ge™ Oo
